title: Barbara Bush, Mariah Carey, Taylor Swift, Ellen DeGeneres, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Barbara Bush, Mariah Carey, Taylor Swift, Ellen DeGeneres, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today was a good day. Barbara Bush will be laid to rest this weekend. Mariah Carey might be dealing with her former manager. A Taylor Swift fan asks Big Dog why he feels the way he does about her EWF cover of September. The CEO also tells Ellen on her show who and what is coming to Celebrity Family Feud. The Closing Remarks covers Earth, Wind and Fire and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
